abstract: Is Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers set to announce a Facebook fund? That’s the suggestion of VentureBeat on the news the venture capital firm is holding a press conference Thursday at the social network’s headquarters.
snippet: Is Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers set to announce a Facebook fund? That’s the suggestion of VentureBeat on the news the venture capital firm is holding a press conference Thursday at the social network’s headquarters.

headline.main: Is There a Facebook Fund in Kleiner’s Future?
